verbs.description: [V: Talk] [ARG1: about a double standard] . In an recent interview with Yahoo Entertainment published Wednesday , Griffin defended fellow comedian Samantha Bee , called Roseanne Barr a “ Nazi , ” and said First Lady Melania Trump belonged in a “ psych ward ” because of President Trump . Her comments came roughly a year after a photo captured her holding the bloody , severed head of President Trump .
